AD_JewelVendor.synopsis: Behaviour AD for the jewel vendor at the music store.

AD_MusicVendor.synopsis: Behaviour AD for the music vendor at the music store.

AD_JewelVendor_0.speaker: Omotola
AD_JewelVendor_0.text: Feeling drab? Why not add a bit of glitter.
AD_JewelVendor_0.context: NodeContext: in her shop, sassily calling out to customers

AD_JewelVendor_1.speaker: Omotola
AD_JewelVendor_1.text: Ruby, amethyst, onyx - the gems of the Realms await you!
AD_JewelVendor_1.context: NodeContext: in her shop, sassily calling out to customers

AD_JewelVendor_2.speaker: Omotola
AD_JewelVendor_2.text: Magical stones for the magical soul, right here!
AD_JewelVendor_2.context: NodeContext: in her shop, sassily calling out to customers

AD_JewelVendor_3.speaker: Omotola
AD_JewelVendor_3.text: A life without luxury is no life at all!
AD_JewelVendor_3.context: NodeContext: in her shop, sassily calling out to customers

AD_MusicVendor_0.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
AD_MusicVendor_0.text: Lute, lyre, drum - all handcrafted by yours truly.
AD_MusicVendor_0.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top

AD_MusicVendor_1.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
AD_MusicVendor_1.text: Every instrument has the Quirkilious seal of approval.
AD_MusicVendor_1.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top

AD_MusicVendor_2.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
AD_MusicVendor_2.text: Peruse the finest artisanal instruments in all of Baldur's Gate.
AD_MusicVendor_2.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top

AD_MusicVendor_3.speaker: Thomas C. Quirkilious
AD_MusicVendor_3.text: Any musical questions? Don't hesitate to ask!
AD_MusicVendor_3.context: NodeContext: gently calling out from his storefront - proud, eager, but not over the top
